Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: A3 and A4 photocopier, CDs, DVDs, language tapes and spoken word cassettes. The library has a meeting room for hire. Activities include Story Time for under 5s. Provides 6 People's Network computers for adults, 2 computers dedicated for use by children, all with Microsoft Office and Internet access, and a scanner available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 9.30am-7.30pm, Tues, Wed & Fri 9.30am-5.30pm, Thurs closed, Sat 9.30am-4pm (opening times); children's library closes for lunch (Mon-Wed & Fri 1-2pm); Tues at 2pm (under 5s, term time only), Fri 10am-12noon (coffee morning), last Tues in the month 10.15-11.15am (Baby Time), 3rd Sat in the month 10am-12noon (MP's Surgery), Breast Feeders Drop-in, please contact for details
